sourcesContent:
import { Component } from '@angular/core'; import {User} from "../models/user"; import {AuthService} from "../auth.service"; import {formatDate} from "@angular/common"; @Component({ selector: 'app-userregister', templateUrl: './user-register.component.html', styleUrls: ['./user-register.component.css'] }) export class UserRegisterComponent { model:any= {}; constructor(private authService: AuthService) { } submitRegister(id:number, firstName:string, lastName:string, gender:string, email:string, phone:string, password:string, birthDate:string){ let size = this.authService.getUsers().subscribe(response => response.users.length); alert(size) let fd = new FormData(); fd.append("id", id.toString()); fd.append("firstName", firstName); fd.append("lastName", lastName); fd.append("gender", gender); fd.append("email", email); fd.append("phone", phone); fd.append("password", password); fd.append("birthDate", birthDate); this.authService.addUser(fd).subscribe((response: any) => { console.log(response); }) } }
